Accreditation                                  Ready to Proceed?           Register Now        Request Information        Events                                                                  The NYU School of Professional Studies Programs in Finance, Law, and Taxation provide a range of courses and certificate programs for students at every level, from seasoned professionals seeking to explore a new specialty, to those whose day-to-day careers might encompass particular aspects of finance, law, and taxation. Our key location in one of the world's most prominent business capitals, New York City, provides you with a direct link to the latest developments, practices, and trends in these continuously evolving industries.           Ready to Proceed?        Register for Courses Now                 Noncredit Courses        Our noncredit finance, law, and accounting courses address pressing issues and are designed to meet your specific needs and level of expertise. Many courses offer continuing education credit for accountants. Whether you work in a Fortune 500 company, a high-profile law firm, or a small business, our courses provide the knowledge and the skills to keep you current.            A Selection of Courses From This Department                                              Advanced Financial Statement Analysis                                                            Corporate Compliance and Ethics                                                            Doing Business in China, India, and Other Emerging Markets                                                            Introduction to International Arbitration and Dispute Resolution                                                            Mergers and Acquisitions Intensive                                                            Negotiation                                                                               View all Finance, Tax, and Law Noncredit Courses           Certificates        Certificate programs, ranging from Financial Planning and International Banking Risk and Regulation to Intellectual Property Law and Not-For-Profit Accounting and Governmental Reporting , provide you with an effective and efficient way to move your career ahead, to gain critical professional credentials, and to provide you with the requisite knowledge to sit for many industry required exams.
